author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Intermap Technologies Q1 Net Loss $0.6 Mln Vs $1.9 Mln
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Intermap Technologies Corp:
* INTERMAP TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 32 PERCENT TO $3.4 MILLION * COMMERCIAL SUBSCRIPTION REVENUE INCREASED 148% FOR QUARTER, COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR
* QTRLY NET INCOME LOSS $0.6 MILLION VERSUS $1.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
